website_summaries.verdict: For the serious videographer who is ready for professional processing speeds and crystal-clear video.
pros: Excellent full manual exposure control and built-in natural density (ND) filters

customer_reviews.title: Great prosumer 4K camcorder!
customer_reviews.text: This being the second to the top end consumer 4K camcorder, it's packed with features. The 1" sensor is a massive improvement over the 1/2" sensors that the sub-$1000 camcorders have, making it superior in low light. The manual focus ring is also much larger and more responsive. The built-in ND filters (3 levels) are fantastic. This is really more of a prosumer model than a consumer one. A lot of great features packed into a tiny package, but yet has a nice weight to it and doesn't feel cheaply made. Great for doc and student filmmakers who want 4K 24p but don't have $5,000 or more to put into a camera just yet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Duncan

customer_reviews.title: And it takes great photos too!
customer_reviews.text: Even five years after its launch, this is an impressive video camera. I had previously used the AX53, but this surpasses the AX53 in every way except stabilization, which, given my shooting style isn’t crucial to me. Beyond its video quality, the hidden gem of this camera is it’s ability in the photo mode. While it lacks the bells and whistles of more modern Sony photo cameras, it still produces still images that rival anything from the RX10 or RX100 series. Back in 2014, Sony got the color science right on this camera, and I’m very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffpsy

customer_reviews.title: Buying used from Amazon Warehouse worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought used good condition from amazon warehouse, for a big savings, and I really don't see how this item was used, looks brand new. Everything still in original packaging. Great value. Tested the camera out a bit but still have to put through its paces. But initial thoughts, it is a very well built camera, and much bigger than the Panasonic it is replacing. Materials feel premium. The ability to change settings manually quickly with the wheel is great. this also has built in ND filters which is rare to find in a consumer camera, and will save you some money not having to buy the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: It died early
customer_reviews.text: Great Camcorder but it died after a few months. Terrific Value and Fab images for the money. However after about 3 months it died, and had black screen. I have had many Sony Camcorders over the years and this is first one to fail. It is now on its way to Sony for repair under warranty. They had good customer service, one quick phone call and they sent prepaid Fedex mail label.
customer_reviews.author: GoGun USA

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best
customer_reviews.text: This camcorder is really nice considering it's a pro-sumer version. It has quite a few pro features on it such as manual white balance. Shoots great looking video in any of the available modes and even records in surround sound in the HD modes. It does NOT record in surround in the 4K modes.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great outdoors in good light, but gets a little grainy indoors. Oversharpening in camera doesn't help with the grain either. Rolling shutter is bad. Combined with lackluster image stabilization, it results in jello effects with any camera shake. Controls should be great, but many issues plague the camera's menus and controls.
customer_reviews.author: DD from MN

customer_reviews.title: Best Sony camera I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best Sony camera I have ever had . The only thing I wished it would do is while in 4k and hooked up to the TV, it won't show Picture . Other than that , its a perfect camera for a novice
customer_reviews.author: dean fluss

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is an expensive piece of equipment, I am very impressed by it. The images have a crispness to them that, for me, puts the AX100 above the competition from other consumer 4K camcorders, both from Sony and Panasonic - forget the footage you'll find on Youtube, its video output has to be seen straight from the memory card to a 4K TV. It is not a professional video camera, of course, but amateur enthusiasts will be well served by it. Highlights: - the clear zoom is very nice, with little loss of quality. - internal ND filters are also extremely useful - low light quality is good, esp. compared to the competition, but not jaw-dropping.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Marques

customer_reviews.title: Great for event photography! So auto focus issues, but overall, a great camcorder.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for over a week and various products, so I knew what I was getting. Just like everyone else has said, this model has a very slow autofocus, but for this price range, I am super impressed with the quality. I just got it, so I will probably get more specific with my review after I have spent more time using it. So far, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Guyton

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and I use them to produce videos for Musicians, businesses and Churches. I am able to monitor/control 3 cameras at once using my ipads. I love the manual features, it makes adjusting for lighting in music videos a snap. The picture quality is great when you lock the camera down on a tripod.. But 4k shooting with fast action is not pro level. I did some great handheld shots a the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. [...]I have been using Them for over a year and the videos I produce for my clients blow them away. I can crop the 4k footage to 1080p and it is crisp and clear giving lots of options while editing.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Geiman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Considering that we get 4K for less than 2K is awesome. Love the lens designed by Zeiss for Sony. Love the fact that you can go almost 100% manual with settings. Love the fact that it has a 3 level ND filter system built in. Have shot some pretty interesting goodies with this from tight macro shots to night shots (infra red) - as well as night shots of the moon. Unbelievable detail in the imagery. But I must forward you, you need to learn the manual settings to achieve such greatness. All auto isn't bad, but for those special shots, learn the manual settings. This camera produces way beyond consumer level and is definitely "pro-sumer" class.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Hohl

customer_reviews.title: The video quality is nothing short of amazing. It is a fairly complicated camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is phenomenal. The video quality is nothing short of amazing. It is a fairly complicated camera, and I have yet to learn all of its capabilities, but it completely blows away "normal" HD cameras. The included software is not as intuitive as I would like, but I can live with that, especially since you can buy top-quality video-editing software (I don't expect software included with a camera to be top-of-the-line anyway.)
customer_reviews.author: Peter in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Therefore I have many similarly-numbered clips in the project which must be separated by an unnecessarily complex folder system
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked very well during overseas 10-day expedition My only complaint is with numbering of clips. Sony rep couldn't tell me how to invoke continuous numbering so that count would progress through the entire four-digit numbering sequence before returning to 1. Each time I started out with a newly-formatted SDXC card the count went back to 1. Therefore I have many similarly-numbered clips in the project which must be separated by an unnecessarily complex folder system during editing. I have both an FDR-AX1 and FDR-AX100: each has the same problem. I truly expected better from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: John Viehe, Ed.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: A great camcorder that was delivered very quickly! The only small negative thing about the camcorder is that 5.1ch audio cannot be recorded when shooting 4K. Not a big deal for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Juha

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Videos clarity is terrific
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Videos clarity is terrific. Easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Moreman

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box ready to use. Open LCD screen and hit record. That simple but then it has a lot of advance settings as well. Incredible picture
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: Incredible image quality from such a small device. The optical zoom range is very useful and the digital zoom actually allows me to do some interesting things such as use this for spotting when on the rifle range. Color and dynamism of the shot is excellent. Have been using this unit for well over a year now with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: FDR AX 100
customer_reviews.text: What an absolutely awesome camera a wee bit of rolling shutter but just incredible images. Get a very fast machine to edit this as the files are large by home standards. Buy it you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Norman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity
customer_reviews.text: Excellent video and audio. Bigger and pricey compared to other camcorders, but for the the resolution it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad V Gourineni

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly clear and steady pictures, but when you zoom ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly clear and steady pictures,but when you zoom in the camcorder takes too long to focus. Also. the there is no internally built-in flash in the picture and the video modes.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my camera
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my camera! Great quality image. I avoid *any* onboard audio for any video equipment when possible. I use a Rode shotgun mic or Zoom H4N (preferred) for external, otherwise I prefer to use lapel mics (Rode RodeLink FM Wireless Filmmaker System) or microphone audio run through my Zoom R24 recorder/mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When shooting in 4k and using the HDMI out to ...
customer_reviews.text: When shooting in 4k and using the HDMI out to a monitor, the monitor screen goes dark when recording and you just have the small flip out screen to look at - this does not happen when recording in HD both the monitor and flip out screen work when recording. If it did this I would've given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: They were great to do business with
customer_reviews.text: This was an outstanding purchase from Downsizer Books. The product was exactly as they said it was. Extremely fast shipping. Contained everything that was listed on the post. They were great to do business with. I have used this video camera about 20 times filming several hours each time. The video is unbelievable and the low light capabilities are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: William Ledley

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Addition to the Family
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camcorder. Add it to your arsenal of tools. I was able to walk into the Biltmore mansion where you aren't allowed to video tape. And I got some footage! Nobody will ever see it but the point is I could!

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and works well
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and works well ... biggest problem is getting good software to burn DVDs in this format .. but if you store in UHD and then burn in 1080p the DVD is great!

customer_reviews.text: could not warranty it because it had been registered before. He told me it had not been registered, but other than that, it is what I wanted and works fine. I went to Sony and updated the software. Well satisfied.

customer_reviews.text: D-rate too low, zeiss lens does not show good Saturation, Effective focus range too little, dont expect it can make any bokeh or blurry background at all.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Camera, great features, great image
customer_reviews.text: 4K resolution, 1" sensor, super compact, SD card media.. Sounded Great! What's the issue? Unfortunately Sony has come up with a new codec again that is not yet supported by most editing systems. If you don't mind transcoding your footage or working in Sony Vegas go for it. You'll enjoy. I got caught with same scenario with their TD10 3D camcorder and it just complicates the workflow, pretty sure I'll send it back with Amazon's GREAT return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff FlyawayEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Dark / bland colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera with high hopes but was dissapointed by what appears to be dark/ dreary colors. Almost like looking through sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camcorder I've ever owned. It has plenty of features for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jnruff

customer_reviews.title: The camera looks very nice. All black with silver highlights
customer_reviews.text: The camera looks very nice. All black with silver highlights. However, when it arrived the AC adapter had a film of dust or lint on it and appeared old and slightly discolored in one or two areas. The same with the lens hood. It seemed slightly scratched or discolored on one or two areas. It is not possible to say if the product was shipped from Sony that way or happened in a warehouse someplace. It is an expensive camera, so you expect EVERYTHING to be pristine and new not somewhat questionable. It makes you doubt the quality of the camera. Based on this, it is not possible to know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: E:61:31
customer_reviews.text: Turned on the camera for the first time and see E:61:31 flashing in the upper right corner of the LCD display. Quick google search reveals the camera has detected an internal error, suggests the camera be sent back to Sony for repair. How disappointing as I put my order in back on Feb 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

product_meta.title: Sony FDR-AX100/B 4K Video Camera with 3.5-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Capture your vision in breathtaking 4K Ultra HD with the camcorder that fits in the palm of your hand. Sporting resolution that"s four times clearer than HD, this changes everything. Footage is captured with true cinematic depth thanks to the 1" image sensor and video is recorded with total versatility in mind: XAVCS, AVCHD and MP4. Put one in your hand and tell your story in 4K. NFC: Yes (NFC forum Type 3 Tag compatible)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



4K CAMCORDER WITH 1" SENSOR
Capture your vision in breathtaking 4K Ultra HD with the camcorder that fits in the palm of your hand. Sporting resolution that’s four times clearer than HD, this changes everything. Footage is captured with true cinematic depth thanks to the 1” image sensor and video is recorded with total versatility in mind: XAVC S2, AVCHD and MP4. Put one in your hand and tell your story in 4K.


TECHNOLOGY
CAPTURE 4K/30P VIDEO THAT FAR EXCEEDS HD RESOLUTION
Capture the finest details in 4k (Full HD 4x resolution , QFHD: 3840 x 2160). This camcorder allows incredibly high resolution, to produce vibrant and extremely realistic images. What’s more, the blazingly fast image processor is the same one employed in professional Sony models, making it possible to record 30p movies at the camera’s full resolution for incredibly smooth and sharp playback, with no loss in realism, even when panning the camera and shooting moving subjects.

1” EXMOR R CMOS SENSOR W/ DIRECT PIXEL READ OUT
The camcorder features Sony's first 1.0" Exmor R CMOS sensor. The back-illuminated technology improves low-light sensitivity and combines with Sony's Column A/D Conversion to reduce noise by 50%. This is great when shooting in dimly lit environments such as night landscapes or indoor scenes.

14MP RESOLUTION VIDEO AND 20MP STILL IMAGE CAPTURE
Create cinematic video with 14MP resolution sensor (for video) and high quality 20MP still images.


VERSATILE SHOOTING W/ XAVC-S, AVCHD AND MP4 CODECS
The FDR-AX100 records HD movies in the XAVC-S format, which uses MPEG-4 AVC/H.264 for video compression and linear PCM for audio compression, while saving files in a MP42 wrapper. The highly compressed files allow extensive record times. The camcorder also records in AVCHD, ideal for quality video for HDTV and Blu-ray disc burning. Additionally, the camcorder can shoot MP4 HD video, which is ideal for sharing over the internet at up to 28Mbps. Having the ability to switch between all three of three formats makes this camcorder an ideal tool that is versatile for creating content to live in a number of different environments.

CARL ZEISS VARIO SONNAR T* LENS W/ 12X OPTICAL ZOOM
The FDR-AX100 comes equipped with a newly developed Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T* lens that has cleared a series of tough performance tests. Not only is this 29mm wide-angle lens ideal for capturing grand landscapes, but it covers wide-ranging image expression thanks to maximum 12x optical zoom and 24x Clear Image zoom

MULTI-INTERFACE ACCESSORY SHOE FOR SYSTEM ACCESSORIES
Users can expand photographic and movie shooting possibilities by attaching optional accessories via the Multi Interface Shoe, including an electronic viewfinder, powerful external flash and stereo microphone. You can also connect with a compatible remote control via Multi Terminal.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
BIONZ X PROCESSOR ENABLES HIGH SPEED REC 120FPS
The new BIONZ X image processor enables the camcorder to create more naturally vivid and lifelike image quality, and higher resolution imagery. Notable features of BIONZ X technology include: 1. Detail reproduction technology optimally filters edges and textures differently depending on the scene. 2. Area specific noise reduction swiftly and efficiently analyzes the subject and reduces noise. This new image processing technology achieves an even better balance of exceptional detail and advanced noise control. Its ability to record at 120p enables slow-motion playback at one-fifth the speed in a 24p environment in post-processing.

OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION W/ ACTIVE MODE
Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization with Intelligent Active Mode is an advanced optical image stabilization technology that corrects camera shake to capture scenes with phenomenal smoothness and stability. Intelligent Active Mode analyzes video frames and provides compensation with assistance from the new BIONZ X image processing engine. Whether recording movies while strolling on vacation, shooting while chasing a child, or zooming in to capture faraway subjects, Handycam’s simple solution smoothly reproduces the scene with a higher level of stability.

HIGH CONTRAST 0.39 OLED EVF FOR EYE-LEVEL FRAMING"
The FDR-AX100 employs high contrast a 0.39” OLED Tru-Finder EVF which reproduces rich color and deep black. A new optical design of the EVF, using four dual-surface aspherical lenses, allows for a 33-degree wide angle view that is amazing clear through the edge of the view finder.


LARGE 3.5 XTRA FINE LCD (921K) "
The 3.5” (16:9) Xtra Fine LCD screen (921K) displays sharp, bright, vivid images, letting you compose a shot more easily - even outdoors, while enabling you to change settings to best represent the scene.

NFC SMARTPHONE LINKING - SIMPLE CONNECTIVITY TO SMARTPHONES VIA WI-FI
Connectivity with smartphones for One-touch sharing/One-touch remote has been simplified with Wi-Fi/NFC control. In addition to Wi-Fi support for connecting to smartphones, the FDR-AX100 also supports NFC (near field communication) providing “touch connection” convenience when transferring images to Android smartphones and tablets. Users need only touch devices to connect; no complex set-up is required. Moreover, when using Smart Remote Control — a feature that allows shutter release to be controlled by a smartphone — connection between FDR-AX100 and the smartphone can be established by simply touching devices.


1Requires NFC-compatible mobile device. Check device’s user manual for compatibility. 2Class 10+ SDXC memory card is required for recording in XAVC S
